prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that resembles a small rabbit with large ears and soft fur.
I want a fairy-type Pokemon with pastel colors and a gentle demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that has healing abilities and loves to help others in need.
Make a Pokemon that can be found in lush forests and has a playful personality.
Imagine a friendly creature that has a special connection with humans and other Pokemon.
Design a Pokemon that has a mix of pink and yellow colors with adorable features.
Give me a Pokemon that can soothe its allies in battle using its calming presence.
